short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prediction markets are embedded within relevent news headlines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prediction markets are embedded next to related news stories.  You can track your own forecasts side-by-side against the markets.  

Supported news sites:
news.google.com
www.yahoo.com/news
www.espn.com ( hoops )
www.facebook.com
www.twitter.com

Supported prediction markets (subset of events):
Betfair
Good Judgement Project
Forecasters Club ( events I could not find a market for )
Metaculus
Paddy Power
PredictIt
Sportsbookag

features:
--See prediction markets that are related to each news article.

--Some custom "forecaster events" included.  The markets shown here are based on user responses.

--Clicking "background" link when available gives list of some background info.

--Badge on top right in browser shows the number of unique market predictions on the page.
